name: hoff
description: A collection of higher order functions you may find useful

scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run compile
scripts.istanbul: npm run lint && npm run compile && istanbul cover --dir coverage/istanbul node_modules/argg dist/test/*.js --report lcovonly
scripts.coverage: npm run lint && npm run compile && istanbul cover --dir coverage/istanbul node_modules/argg dist/test/*.js --report html
scripts.test: npm run istanbul && npm run coveralls

author: Vinnie Garcia <vinnie@coev.co>
